title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

description.en:
Woken up from a date, he’s suddenly in a movie set? Wait, he’s been reborn as a baby martial artist!  
  
In Jongnam Clan, which was once one of the 9 strongest clans, he receives the name “Gunchung” and uses the knowledge of his past life to learn the true meaning of martial arts.  
  
When your perspective is different, your martial arts changes. Armed with knowledge, Gunchung brings about a new age of martial arts!

altTitles.th: สูตรลับตำรับดันเจียน

description.en:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
description.es: Después de que su hermana fuera devorada por un dragón y habiendo perdido todas sus provisiones, Laios y su equipo están decididos a salvar a Farin antes de que sea digerida por la gran bestia. Es así como conocen a un singular enano que los introducirá al mundo gastronómico de las mazmorras: delicias elaboradas a partir de la carne de murciélagos gigantes, hongos caminantes y mandrágoras chillonas.
description.id:
Seorang penjelajah muda, Laios, bersama kawan-kawannya mendapat serangan hebat dari seekor naga jauh di lantai terdalam Dungeon. Mereka kehilangan seluruh uang dan perbekalan, bahkan seorang anggota tim! Walau ingin bergegas kembali dan menyelamatkan rekannya, mereka dihalangi satu masalah besar, “Tanpa makanan dan uang, mereka pasti akan kelaparan di tengah penjelajahan!” Namun, Laios mendapat ide cemerlang, “Kita makan monster saja!”. Slime, kalajengking, basilisk, mandrake, dan kelelawar raksasa… Tidak ada satu monster pun yang luput dari perut-perut keroncongan di Dungeon!! (Gramedia.com) 

[Terjemah Indonesia](https://www.gramedia.com/search?q=delicious%20in%20dungeon)
description.pt-br:
Depois de perder todos os seus suprimentos e provisões e também ter sua irmã devorada por um dragão durante uma expedição na masmorra, Laios e seu grupo estão determinados a salvá-la antes que ela seja completamente digerida pelo dragão.
Mas estando completamente falidos e tendo que recorrer a comer monstros como alimento, eles encontram um anão que os apresentará ao mundo de Dungeon Meshi – uma deliciosa culinária feita com ingredientes como a carne de morcegos gigantes, cogumelos andarilhos e até mesmo mandrágoras.

altTitles.ja: バックストリートガールズ ～ゴクドルズ～

description.en:
A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)

altTitles.en: The story about my office noona

description.en:
Ahn was a mature and attractive older woman I met through my company's task force. Wise and caring, that's how I became captivated with her… However, she was also a woman with a child.  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nianshangjiejiedeyouhuo/list?title_no=1562)

A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

description.en:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated 
by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.

The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

description.en: Kei often gets involved in fights, despite of him being weak and always end up losing. One day, while helping a friend to bring some textbooks to an old building of his school, he and his childhood friend, Tomoe, are attacked by a monster. In order to save his friend, Kei will choose to become a Grave Protector!
description.ru: Томицука Кей – слабак, неудачник и просто коротышка, живущий в одном из маленьких городков Японии. Но все же в этом пареньке что-то есть… И это что-то – чувство справедливости, да такое, которого нету ни у кого из его сверстников. Один раз он отправился в старое здание школы вместе со своей подругой детства. Побродив там немного, Кей попал… попал на кладбище, которое находилось за огромной дверью… И открыв эту дверь, Кей выпустил на свободу 8 монстров . Чтобы спасти свою подружку от одного из таких чудовищ, Кей заключает договор с Цербером. Получив силу, распрощался со своей обычной повседневной жизнью…

description.en: In a world where demons seek to destroy humanity, a vagabond named Riseman Sawyer travels in search of the ingredients for the spell called "Deadman's Recipe". This magic has the power to resurrect the dead, and thereby revive his late wife who had died using the spell herself to save Riseman.
description.ru:
Одинокий бродяга странствует в поиске редких ингредиентов для рецепта воскрешения его любимой.  


---

**Officially Translated:**

altTitles.th: หลานจอมปราชญ์

description.en:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi."  
Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic  
Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.  
"Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense."  
The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.

altTitles.ja: ウロボロス 警察ヲ裁クハ我ニアリ

description.en:
Ikuo Ryuuzaki and Danno Tatsuya are two orphaned boys who were looked after by a woman they called 'sensei'. Following their sensei's brutal murder, the two vow to hunt down her killers and the police officers who neglected to properly investigate the case.  
  
15 years later, Ryuuzaki is a police detective and Tatsuya has become the leader of a group of mobsters. Helping each other out behind the scenes, they strive to rise to the tops of their respective fields so that they may exact their vengeance.

In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!
description.pt-br:
Em 1950, uma idosa foi brutalmente morta na face de uma Torre do Relógio por sua filha adotiva. Dois anos depois, a Torre do Relógio ficou conhecida como a "Torre Fantasma" e está supostamente assombrada. Através dessas séries de eventos incomuns, um jovem NEET chamado Amano Taichi é atacado por alguém ou algo na mesma Torre do Relógio, e encontra-se preso na face do relógio, pronto pra ser morto da mesma maneira que a idosa foi. Pra sorte de Amano, ele não encontra o mesmo destino. Ele é resgatado por uma pessoa misteriosa que alega se chamar Tetsuo.

Tetsuo está procurando por um tesouro que está  conectado com a Torre Fantasma, e ele quer que Taichi seja seu parceiro. Taichi fica mais convencido sobre a proposta quando sua casa pega fogo e fica sem onde morar, sendo obrigado a depender da caridade de Tetsuo. A aventura vai ser extremamente perigosa, já que os mesmos 'inimigos' quem atacaram Taichi antes parecem que vão tentar algo novamente! Sem mencionar que, Taichi realmente sabe muito pouco sobre seu parceiro, incluindo "seu" verdadeiro sexo!

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I got to remote class, I had to move in with the most beautiful girl in my class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night.
He was asked by help from Hoshikawa who is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet.
He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!
The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

There is also an alternative version:
[A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e/a-parallel-world-with-a-1-39-male-to-female-ratio-is-unexpectedly-normal-r18)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.ar: لقد تجسدت كشخصية في لعبة الحريم العكسية التي كنت ألعبها قبل أن أموت، أصبحت بينولوبي إبنة زوجة الدوق إيكارد.لكن الصعوبة يجب أن تكون الأسوأ فكل ما أفعله سيقودني إلى الموت. فأنا الشخصة الشريرة في قصة هذه اللعبة، لذا يجب أن أنال دعم أحد الشخصيات الذكورية الرئيسية من حريم البطلة قبل ظهور الابنة الحقيقية" لعائلة الدوق شقيقاي الكبيران دائما ما يخوضان قتال معي في كل شيء صغير. و الأمير المتوج المجنون الذي يؤدي طريقه دائمًا إلى موتي. "أنا أرى البطلة فقط ولا أحد آخر ، وكذلك فارسها الرقيق المخلص . "لم أكن أعرف مكاني حتى الآن من الآن فصاعدًا ، سأعيش هادئة مثل الفأر ولن أهتم بشيء لكن لماذا يستمر اهتمامهم بي بالازدياد في كل مرة أرسم فيها الحدود ؟!
description.cs:
Penelope Eckarthová sa prevtelila do adoptívnej dcéry vojvodu Eckartha a záporáčky z reverzného harému. Problém je v tom, že do hry vstúpila na najťažšiu obtiažnosť a nech urobí čokoľvek, v každom závere ju čaká smrť! Skôr než sa objaví "skutočná dcéra" vojvodu Eckartha, musí si vybrať jedného z mužských hrdinov a dosiahnuť šťastný koniec, aby prežila. Dvaja bratia sa s ňou však vždy pohádajú kvôli každej maličkosti, rovnako ako bláznivý korunný princ, ktorého všetky cesty vedú k smrti. Je tu dokonca aj čarodejník, ktorý je do hlavnej hrdinky zamilovaný, a verný otrok rytier! Ale merače priazne hlavných mužských postáv sa akosi zvyšujú, čím viac s nimi prekračuje hranicu! Toto je príbeh o prežití Penelope, ktorá sa ocitla v šialenom reverznom haréme zoznamiek!

---

description.en:
Penelope Eckart reincarnated as the adopted daughter of Duke Eckart and the villainess of a reverse harem dating sim. The problem is, she entered the game at its hardest difficulty, and no matter what she does, death awaits her at every ending! Before the "real daughter" of Duke Eckart appears, she must choose one of the male leads and reach a happy ending in order to survive. But the two brothers always pick a fight with her over every little thing, as well as a crazy crown prince, whose routes all lead to death. There's even a magician who's enamoured with the female lead, and a loyal slave knight! But somehow, the favourability meters of the male leads increase the more she crosses the line with them!

This is Penelope’s survival story, who’s been dropped in an insane reverse harem dating sim!

---

**Official English Translations:** [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/villains-are-destined-to-die/info), [KManhwa](https://kmanhwa.com/comics-online/the-villains-ending-is-death/)
*Tappytoon and Radish are using the Tapas localization.*
description.fr:
Après avoir réussi à fuir son horrible famille, elle pense enfin pouvoir vivre comme elle l’entend. C'est sans compter sur le destin. Tout à coup, la voilà propulsée dans le jeu le plus en vogue du moment. Et elle incarne la méchante de l’histoire, rien que ça! Le problème, c’est qu’elle a déjà fait une multitude de parties en incarnant la vilaine et chacune se concluait par la mort du personnage… Comment va-t-elle pouvoir changer le sort de la diabolique Penelope et éviter le game over?

---

description.id:
Penelope Eckart adalah tokoh antagonis dalam game dating simulation Princess Love Love Project yang akhir-akhir ini terkenal. Di setiap akhir cerita mode normal, tokoh Penelope selalu berakhir dengan kematian di tangan satu dari 5 tokoh pria. Tiba-tiba saja, seorang gadis Korea masuk ke dalam game itu sebagai Penelope Eckart, anak angkat keluarga Duke yang dibenci dan direndahkan semua orang. Dari pengetahuannya di masa lalu, Penelope tahu bahwa ia akan mati dengan mudah jika ia tidak segera mendapatkan hati dari salah satu tokoh pria. Sayangnya, semua tokoh itu adalah orang yang membenci Penelope dan akan membunuhnya jika dia salah langkah. Pilihannya pun terbatas pada Derrick Eckart si kakak angkat yang dingin, Reynold Eckart si kakak angkat yang sering menghina Penelope, Vinter Berdandi si Marquess yang memiliki banyak rahasia, Iklies si budak yang memiliki kemampuan pedang, atau Callisto Regulus si putra mahkota yang menganggap nyawa orang lain sebagai debu. Reputasi Penelope yang buruk dan status di rumahnya sebagai anak angkat yang diabaikan membuat perjalanan hidupnya makin sulit. Mampukan Penelope mengubah pandangan orang terhadapnya dan bertahan hidup?

---

description.it:
Dopo essermi addormentata mentre completavo un gioco attualmente di tendenza, mi sono risvegliata come Penelope Eckhart, la figlia adottiva del Duca Eckhart e malvagia del gioco di simulazione a cui stavo giocando! Il problema è che sono finita nella modalità difficile, e qualunque cosa faccia, a ogni ending mi aspetta la morte! Prima che appaia la "vera figlia" del Duca Eckhart, per riuscire a sopravvivere devo scegliere uno dei protagonisti maschili e raggiungere un lieto fine. Ma i miei due fratelli litigano sempre con me per ogni cosa, così come il folle principe ereditario, a cui tutte le strade portano alla morte. C'è perfino un mago innamorato della protagonista femminile e un leale cavaliere schiavo!

---

description.ja:
私は絶対死なない 何としてでも生き延びてみせる

『何度でも繰り返してやる。死以外のエンディングを迎えるまで…』

友達の勧めではじめた乙女ゲーム、公女様のラブラブ・プロジェクト――。
悪女キャラの『ペネロペ』に感情移入し
ハードモードで死亡エンドを繰り返すも、寝落ち。
そして目覚めると…私がまさかの『ペネロペ』に――!?
1度の選択ミスでも即GAME OVER!
リセット無しのこの世界で、死亡エンドを避けるために奮闘する
ファンタジーコミックス第1巻!!

description.ko:
재벌가의 사생아로 태어나 가족들에게 미움만 받다가 겨우 탈출했는데, 연애 시뮬레이션 게임 속 악역 ‘페넬로페 에카르트’에게 빙의해 버렸다! 진짜 여주인공이 돌아오기 전, 다섯 명의 남자 주인공 중 한 명을 공략하지 못하면… 그녀에게 남은 엔딩은 오직 죽음뿐!

카카오페이지 역하렘 로맨스판타지 웹툰 최다 추천작으로 꼽히는 「악역의 엔딩은 죽음뿐」이 단행본으로 출간되었다. 동명의 인기 소설을 수월 작가의 아름다운 작화로 화려하게 재탄생시킨 작품으로, 연재 시작과 동시에 열렬한 팬덤을 형성하며 나날이 인기를 더해 가고 있다.

description.pt:
Eu vou recomeçar até que o destino dessa vilã… Não seja a morte. 

Nascida e criada como filha ilegítima de uma família rica e dona de conglomerado, ela finalmente conseguiu escapar daquela casa infernal, mas então… acabou sendo transportada para um jogo de simulação de relacionamento e virou a vilã, Penelope Eckhart. Se ela falhar em conquistar um dos cinco personagens principais antes da protagonista do jogo retornar, seu destino será apenas a morte! Em um jogo de vida ou morte, quem será o rapaz que Penelope escolherá?

---

description.ru:
Еще вчера я была обычной девушкой, а сегодня... проснулась Пенелопой Экхарт - главной злодейкой в популярной игре "Любовь принцессы". Пенелопу ненавидят, над ней издеваются, и все считают ее ничтожеством. Сводные братья, отец, кронпринц и даже прислуга желают ей лишь одного - смерти. Каждое неверное слово или поступок ведут к гибели. Чтобы выжить, нужно завоевать сердце хотя бы одного из мужчин. Удастся ли злодейке на этот раз обмануть саму смерть?

---
Я перевоплотилась в злодейку, единственную дочь семьи Эккарт. Но самое ужасное — что бы я ни делала, всё приводит меня только к смерти! Я должна сблизиться с кем-то из мужчин гарема героини, прежде чем появится «настоящая дочь» семьи Эккарт!
Два старших брата, которые всегда ссорятся со мной по любому пустяку. Безумный наследный принц, благодаря которому моя жизнь заканчивается смертью.

*По одноимённому роману Квон Гёыль.*

---
Пенелопа Эккарт перевоплотилась в приемную дочь герцога Эккарта и в злодейку из обратного гарема. Проблема в том, что она вступила в игру в самый трудный момент, и независимо от того, что она делает, в конце ее ждет смерть! Прежде чем появится "истинная дочь" герцога Эккарта, она должна стать возлюбленной одного из мужских персонажей и дойти до счастливого финала, чтобы выжить. Но два брата всегда ссорятся с ней из-за каждой мелочи, а также безумный наследный принц, ветка с которым ведет к смерти. Есть даже волшебник, влюбленный в главную героиню, и верный рыцарь-раб! Но, так или иначе, благосклонность мужских персонажей увеличивается еще больше, когда она проводит черту между ними! Это история выживания Пенелопы, которая попала в безумный симулятор свиданий обратного гарема!

---

description.sr: Opsednuta sam ovom igrom! Kao da je zavladala mojim životom… čekaj - AKTIVIRAN TEŠKI REŽIM. Ne-ne-ne-ne-ne! Bukvalno me je uzela i bacila u ulogu Penelope Eckhart. Ljubav je laka kad si heroina, ali kao omraženi negativac, trudim se da ne umrem… od ruke moje braće… princa… viljuške…svaki mogući kraj je smrt! Ovaj svet je naslagan protiv mene, ali mogu li moja pamet i znanje o igrama postići ljubav od ovih muških likova? Ili dugme za resetovanje???
description.tr:
Penelope Eckart; Dük Eckart'ın evlatlık kızı ve harem partner simülatörünün kötü karakteri olarak reenkarne oldum. Sorun şu ki, oyuna en zor seviyede girdi ve ne yaparsa yapsın, her seferinde ölümle burun buruna geliyor! Dük Eckart'ın "gerçek kızı" ortaya çıkmadan önce, erkek ana karakterlerden birini seçmeli ve hayatta kalmak için mutlu bir sona ulaşmalıdır. Ama bu iki kardeş onunla her zaman, en ufak bir şeyde bile kavgaya tutuşuyor. Bununla birlikte rotaları ölüme yol açan çılgın bir veliaht prens, dişi kurşunla büyülenmiş bir sihirbaz ve sadık bir köle şövalyesi bile var! Ama nasıl oluyorsa, ne zaman çizgiyi aşsa ana karakterler ile olan aşk ölçeri yükseklik gösteriyor!

İşte bu çılgın bir harem simülasyonunun içinde tıkalı kalmış Penelope'un hikayesi.

---

description.zh:
穿越成乙女手游中的反派，不论如何选择，结局都是死亡？冷漠大哥、毒舌二哥、嗜血皇太子、神秘魔法师、小狼狗骑士…身为失宠的公爵养女，在"真正的公爵千金"出现前，必须攻略一个男主才能活下去…可这五个人都很危险的样子怎么办？

---

title.en: Jichou shinai Moto Yuusha no Tsuyokute Tanoshii New Game

altTitles.zh-hk: 不自重前勇者強大又輕鬆的NEW GAME

altTitles.zh: 不自重前勇者强大又轻松的NEW GAME

altTitles.ja: 自重しない元勇者の強くて楽しいニューゲーム

altTitles.en: The Former Legendary Hero Will Enjoy His Second Life Without Restraint

description.en:
Orion is a former hero who has been reborn in a different world he once saved as a "hero".

Taking advantage of his second round of heroic heroism, he takes on the world's strongest and wisest maid who was once in the same party with him, picks up a slave girl, and trains her with "heroic-style power leveling"!

Even if you are attacked by a thief monster girl, you can easily convert her and get her a friend!

The former hero who never takes responsibility for his own actions, who has acquired a luxurious mansion, the most powerful equipment, beautiful women, fame, and everything else he needs to live his life the way he wants to, has started a new game of strength and fun!

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en:
Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!

The romantic comedy of a pure-hearted demon's first love, begins!

(Source: Shounen Magazine, translated)
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

title.en: I Was Reborn as His Highness the Prince's Little Evil Dragon

altTitles.zh: 我重生成为王子殿下的小恶龙

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Chongsheng Chengwei Wangzi Dianxia De Xiao E Long

description.fr: Après 18 ans de vie paisible, j'ai été tué du jour au lendemain et transformé en dragon. Moi, Bian Yurong, un étudiant, doté d'un excellent caractère et d'une grande intégrité, qui obtenait des notes parfaites à la fois en études et en affaires, j'ai fini par mourir des mains d'une personne malveillante. Ce qui est encore plus triste, c'est que je suis devenu le boss final du jeu auquel je jouais, le Dragon noir ! Puisque je connais déjà clairement la fin, je dois changer mon destin ! Attendez, pourquoi ce jeune prince qui est chargé de m'élever se comporte-t-il de façon si étrange ?

description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.
A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
description.ja: 「学園の王子様」なヒロインを巡って少年少女がせめぎ合う一触即発ラブコメディ

title.en: Dorei Tensei: Sono Dorei, Saikyou no Moto Ouji ni Tsuki

altTitles.en: Slave Reincarnation ~ That Slave, is the Strongest Former Prince ~

altTitles.ru: Реинкарнация раба ~ Этот раб, бывший сильнейший принц ~

altTitles.ja: 奴隷転生～その奴隷、最強の元王子につき～

altTitles.zh: 奴隸轉生～這奴隸曾是最強王子～

altTitles.en: The prince reincarnated into slavery to make his dream come true

description.en: Ars, the prince of the Kingdom of Karitz, who was called the strongest wizard, died at a young age. But on the verge of death, he uses reincarnation magic. Reincarnated as Wals Sai, a slave with the best body! Wals, who became the escort of a princess in a small country, became a matchless slave who used his best body and magic to crush all enemies!
description.pt-br: Ars, o príncipe do Reino de Karitz, que era chamado de o mago mais forte, morreu jovem. Mas à beira da morte, ele usa a magia da reencarnação. Reencarnado como Wals Sai, um escravo com o melhor corpo! Wals, que se tornou a escolta de uma princesa em um pequeno país, tornou-se um escravo incomparável que usou seu melhor corpo e magia para esmagar todos os inimigos!

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, the Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain, Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club, his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!  
  
Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.

One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!  


---
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

description.en: A captivating new teacher, Miss Kasai, arrives at a troubled classroom. The previous teacher had been hospitalized after a tragic attempt at self-harm, driven to despair by student bullying. "My goal as a teacher is to bring joy to my students," she says with a laugh, before turning her attention to addressing the bullies in her own unique way. However, the students are about to discover that Miss Kasai is not to be underestimated. Could Miss Kasai be hiding a darker side?

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

altTitles.ja: 2ndバージンのじょうずな捨て方

altTitles.en: How To Skillfully Lose Your 2nd Viriginity

altTitles.vi: Cách Vứt Bỏ Trinh Tiết Lần Hai

description.en:
Chiaki ended up being called a dead fish after his first time having sex with his boyfriend didn't go so well. Afterward, he ended up drunkenly calling a gay AV company to apply as a gay actor, and the perfect guy he meets there is...?! 

Drawn by Zunda Mochiko-sensei, an exceptionally thorough private lesson!
description.vi: Kei yêu thầm Chiaki từ thời còn đi học, anh quyết định tỏ tình ngày Chiaki sắp tốt nghiệp nhưng vì Chiaki hoang mang (do lần đầu được con trai tỏ tình) thì Kei (chưa kịp nghe câu trả lời) đã bỏ chạy mất dép vì nghĩ anh ghê tởm mình, sau này cũng vì quá buồn do thất tình nên Kei mới sống buông thả mình ( thậm chí làm diễn viên đóng phim) gần mấy năm trời nhưng Kei cũng chỉ chung thủy yêu mình Chiaki, đến lúc khi cả 2 người đã thành người yêu mỗi sáng Kei vẫn cứ hỏi đi hỏi lại Chiaki “Liệu em có đang nằm mơ không anh” vì nghĩ mình và Chiaki sẽ không bao giờ thành đôi được.

description.en: One day, in a drunken stupor, Jiheon, a man whose love for pretty things is second to none at Hankuk Uni, suddenly confesses out of nowhere to a junior he doesn't even know. He very much wanted to brush it off as a misunderstanding, only to be suckered (?) by the heartfelt tears of said junior, and they soon start dating...

The manga centers on three sixth graders, Yoshiki Obana, Mikoto Tajo, and Kikuri Kushida, who meet up at morning to get to the bottom of their town's "seven mysteries" as a free summer vacation project. After finishing one meeting at their "secret base", Yoshiki meets a mysterious ghost on his way home.

altTitles.en: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
description.pt-br: Ichinose Shiki, um herdeiro do sangue de Oni, viveu toda a sua infância alheio a esse fato. No entanto, quando um homem desconhecido entra correndo em sua casa na tentativa de assassiná-lo, seu pai adotivo finalmente revela a verdade. Em um mundo onde Oni e Momotarou nunca puderam coexistir, junte-se a Ichinose em sua luta pelo poder e unificando as duas raças!

description.en: Yoosu, whose first love is his childhood neighbor, Chungwoo, gets his feelings discovered by Chungwoo's sister, Jiwoo. Jiwoo proposes to the flustered Yoosu that he become her fake boyfriend so Yoosu is able to see Chungwoo more often. But contrary to his initial hesitance about his feelings for the other, after seeing Chungwoo again for the first time in a long time, Yoosu is greedy to get closer to him...

Novice lyricist Baek Jiseok enters A&R Co. through a recommendation from his college senior and is assigned to compose the lyrics of a new song for renowned singer Cha Doyoon. However, his lyrics are stolen, and he finds himself on the brink of a lawsuit. 
The person who extends a helping hand in this situation to the desperate Jiseok is none other than Cha Doyoon?!
"Why are you helping me?"
Will Jiseok be able to pen his lyrics successfully even as he cohabitates with the unfathomable Doyoon?

title.en: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？

altTitles.en: What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?

description.en:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the Armor Bug' a mutant insect monster that can defeat all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its range of survival. The only ones who can stand against such armored insects are the Chouhi, girls who harbor insects that have evolved differently from armored insects.

One of the candidates to become a butterfly princess, Ayumi Komiwa, is still suffering from the reality that she cannot become a butterfly princess. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her, has left her, and the person she admires no longer treats her in the slightest.

Those days of despair came to an end when he was on the verge of death in a battle with armored insects.
"Why don't you just die for nothing!"

With the end near, the girl transformed her body into a butterfly. And the flapping of its wings transforms the world...!

title.en: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ不遇スキルの異世界召喚叛逆記～最弱スキル【吸収】が全てを飲み込むまで～

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

300 years ago, Martial God Hyun-oh Kim defeated Barche, the boss of the tower of destruction, and prevented the end of the world. Kim Hyun-oh, should have died suffering the same fate as the tower of destruction. However, after 300 years, he is reborn as the 17-year-old Kim Joo-hyuk. In the midst, he finds out that the “Constellations”, that were created during his absence, are his disciples from 300 years ago and sets on a journey to find them.

title.en: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.ja: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um otaku tímido e pobre, mas essa jovem linda e rica está obcecada por mim

altTitles.ru: Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной.

altTitles.en: I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me

description.en: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
description.ja:
YouTube動画で550万再生！　運命に導かれたベタ甘ラブコメ！
エイジは陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど他人に対する思いやりの気持ちを忘れない素直な少年。そんなエイジも憧れる社長令嬢アオイさんがある日、エイジの自宅を訪れ、突如としてエイジとの婚約を告げるが…。

Yūchūbu dōga de 550 man saisei! Unmei ni michibika reta beta ama rabu kome! Eiji wa in kya de wotaku de binbōdakedo tanin ni taisuru omoiyari no kimochi o wasurenai sunaona shōnen. Son'na eiji mo akogareru shachō reijō aoi-san ga aru hi, eiji no jitaku o otozure, totsujotoshite eiji to no kon'yaku o tsugeruga….
description.ru: Эйдзи — старшеклассник, живущий со своим отцом, неудачливым писателем. Он застенчивый, отаку, бедный, но честный мальчик, который никогда не забывает о сострадании к другим, как его научила покойная мать. Он тоскует по Аой, дочери президента крупной компании. Однако, Эйдзи не может смотреть Аой в глаза из-за огромного несоответствия между ней и им самим. Однажды после школы Аой приветствует Эйдзи, когда тот приходит домой. Аой говорит удивленному Эйдзи одну удивительную вещь...
description.pt-br: Eiji é um estudante do ensino médio que vive com seu pai, um romancista malsucedido. Ele é um baita nerd, e mesmo sendo pobre é um menino obediente que não esquece a compaixão alheia que sua falecida mãe lhe ensinou. Aoi, filha do presidente de uma grande empresa, admira essa idade. No entanto, Eiji não conseguia nem olhar para a enorme disparidade consigo mesmo. Depois da escola um dia, Aoi cumprimenta Eiji quando ela chega em casa. Eiji fica surpreso quando Aoi lhe diz uma palavra de surpresa...

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house.... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him? Thus begins a new story, a new erotic comedy!
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

description.en: The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!
description.es: La Sociedad Secreta Kisaragi tiene una misión: dominación mundial. Afirman que es una organización malvada, pero su científica es excéntrica, sus ardientes generales mujeres usan poca ropa y están sorprendentemente preocupados por el destino del mundo. No. 6 es un Combatiente para Kisaragi, lo que significa que su cuerpo ha sido reconstruido para ser más fuerte y obedecer las órdenes de los generales. ¿Su última misión? Hacer reconocimiento en un planeta alienígena desconocido con su nueva pareja, la inexpresiva androide Alicia. Allí, conocí a una caballero tetona…¡¿montando un unicornio?! ¡Así comienza su hilarante invasión de un mundo mágico de fantasía!
description.pt: Havia uma empresa chamada Kisaragi, uma sociedade secreta do mal que derruba um número de heróis no mundo e está prestes a conquistar o muno. Como não se sabe os desejos dessa associação, o combatente N° 6, o protagonista, será despachado para outros planetas com a android Alice. No entanto, este combatente mudou as configurações da android pare que ela não se comportasse como se fosse uma invasão, e sim u festival de Ochin, fazendo seus companheiros ficarem estúpidos. Além disso, quando chamaram novos companheiros, os novos membros que se uniram atraíram estandarismo, como a estupida quimera e o bispo. Enquanto isso, o mesmo vendedor que invoca o exército Magus começa a invadir a terra para destruí-la. A notícia se espalha nas ruas por atos de contravenção, e é transmitida ao herói que estava carregando a virtude do mal. “Não há organizações más no mundo” combatente N° 6 finalmente entra em ação com as heroínas metamorfose e as táticas de Kudzu, invadindo o novo mundo.
description.ru: Протагонистом является старший элитный боец корпорации зла именуемой как "Тайное сообщество Кисараги", которого вместе с девочкой андроидом отправили в другое измерение. И так они оказываются в мире меча и магии, где им предстоит создать предпосылки для захвата этого нового мира корпорацией зла Кисараги.

description.en:
After failing the auditions for a role he'd been preparing for, Lyle takes a trip to Korea for a change of pace. As a black-footed cat-man, he was not able to present himself as a top amongst the larger beastmen, but having travelled to this place with all sorts of small and cute animals that suited his tastes, he thinks he could be a top here. After downloading an online dating app, Lyle starts chatting with a rabbit-man with the handle 'Kkyu', and steadily grows fond of him. Finally, the day they meet arrives! However, what appears before Lyle, as his heart pounds, is... a brute-like rabbit...?!
"Is this person... really my Kkyu...?!"
description.fr: Lyle, un chat sauvage qui se sent inférieur aux autres prédateurs, est venu en Corée après avoir échoué à une audition pour un rôle qu'il préparait. Bien qu'il soit en concurrence avec d'autres mâles, il est heureux de découvrir qu'il y a plein d'animaux adorables et mignons qui correspondent à ses goûts. Lyle fait ensuite la rencontre de "Kkyu" sur une application de rencontres, qu'il finit par commencer à apprécier. Le jour de leur rencontre arrive enfin ! Mais Lyle découvre que la personne avec qu'il parlait est en fait... un lapin grincheux ?! "C'est vraiment... mon Kkyu ??!"

description.en:
Akira's older brother, Atsushi, has been missing for two years.   
  
One day, a mysterious woman who seems to know Atsushi's last known whereabouts appears and offers to take him and his friends there : to the island of Higanjima.   
  
Thus the great Man vs Vampire epic begins…
description.pt-br: O jovem promissor Atsushi desaparece deixando toda a sua responsabilidade como "filho perfeito" recair sobre seu irmão Akira. Dois anos se passam e agora Akira e seus leais amigos se deparam com uma pista do paradeiro de Atsushi, mas junto com a pista e a bela jovem que a traz está um monstro com força descomunal, olhos vermelho-escuro e cabelos brancos sedento por sangue. O que teria acontecido a Atsushi? Será que Akira e seus amigos conseguirão sobreviver para descobrir?
